pkgmetadata.longdescription: Latent (Variable) Analysis with Bayesian Learning // A variety of models to analyze latent variables based on Bayesian learning: the partially CFA (Chen, Guo, Zhang, Pan, 2020) DOI: 10.1037/met0000293; generalized PCFA; partially confirmatory IRM (Chen, 2020) DOI: 10.1007/s11336-020-09724-3; Bayesian regularized EFA DOI: 10.1080/10705511.2020.1854763; Fully and partially EFA.
